title: S15 Ep76: The Fall of Murder, Inc. with Michael Cannell
itunes:title: The Fall of Murder, Inc. with Michael Cannell
description:
True Crime Tuesday reveals A Brotherhood Betrayed: The Man behind the rise & fall of Murder, Inc. with guest Michael Cannell PLUS Dumb Crimes & Stupid Criminals

This is the riveting true story of the rise and fall of Murder, Inc. and the executioner-turned-informant whose mysterious death became a turning point in Mob history.

All that plus Brand New Dumb Crimes & Stupid Criminals!

Get the book here: https://amazon.com
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
